mapper.select: SELECT a.red_packet_video_id AS redPacketId, a.red_packet_video_user_id AS memberAccount, a.red_packet_video_money_count AS redPacketMoneyCount, a.red_packet_video_count AS redPacketCount, a.red_packet_video_stock AS redPacketStock, DATE_FORMAT(a.red_packet_video_date,'%m月%d日') AS redPacketDate, (a.red_packet_video_count - a.red_packet_video_stock) AS robRedPacketCount, '视频广告' AS redPacketType FROM zx_app_video_red_packet AS a WHERE a.red_packet_video_user_id = #{memberAccount}

SELECT a.red_packet_video_id AS redPacketVideoId, a.red_packet_video_user_id AS redPacketVideoUserId, a.red_packet_video_money_count AS redPacketMoneyCount, a.red_packet_video_count AS redPacketVideoCount, a.red_packet_video_stock AS redPacketVideoStock, a.red_packet_video_info AS redPacketVideoInfo, a.red_packet_video_luck_star AS redPacketVideoLuckStar, a.red_packet_video_start_time AS redPacketVideoStartTime, a.red_packet_video_end_time AS redPacketVideoEndTime, a.red_packet_video_question AS redPacketVideoQuestion, a.red_packet_video_options AS redPacketVideoOptions, a.red_packet_video_answer AS redPacketVideoAnswer, a.red_packet_video_sex AS redPacketVideoSex, a.red_packet_video_age_start AS redPacketVideoAgeStart, a.red_packet_video_age_end AS redPacketVideoAgeEnd, a.red_packet_video_date AS redPacketVideoDate FROM zx_app_video_red_packet a WHERE a.red_packet_video_id = #{redPacketVideoId} AND a.red_packet_video_user_id = #{memberAccount}

SELECT red_packet_video_info_id AS redPacketVideoInfoId, red_packet_video_id AS redPacketVideoId, red_packet_video_user_id AS redPacketVideoUserId, red_packet_video_money AS redPacketVideoMoney, red_packet_video_luck_star AS redPacketVideoLuckStar, red_packet_video_date AS redPacketVideoDate FROM zx_app_video_red_packet_info WHERE red_packet_video_id = #{redPacketVideoId} AND red_packet_video_user_id = #{robUserId} LIMIT 1

SELECT zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_info_id AS "redPacketInfoId", zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_id AS "redPacketId", zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_user_id AS "redPacketUserId", zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_money AS "redPacketMoney", zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_luck_star AS "redPacketLuckStar", zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_date AS "redPacketDate", UNIX_TIMESTAMP( zx_app_video_red_packet.red_packet_video_end_time ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( zx_app_video_red_packet.red_packet_video_start_time ) AS "timeSum" FROM zx_app_video_red_packet_info LEFT JOIN zx_app_video_red_packet ON zx_app_video_red_packet.red_packet_video_id = zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_id WHERE zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_id = #{redPacketVideoId} AND zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_user_id IS NULL LIMIT 1

SELECT zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_info_id AS "redPacketInfoId", zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_id AS "redPacketId", zx_app_video_red_packet.red_packet_video_user_id AS "redPacketUserId", zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_user_id AS "robRedPacUserId", zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_money AS "redPacketMoney", zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_luck_star AS "redPacketLuckStar", zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_date AS "redPacketDate", zx_app_video_red_packet.red_packet_video_stock AS "redPacketStock", UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zx_app_video_red_packet.red_packet_video_end_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zx_app_video_red_packet.red_packet_video_start_time) AS "timeSum" FROM zx_app_video_red_packet_info LEFT JOIN zx_app_video_red_packet ON zx_app_video_red_packet.red_packet_video_id = zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_id WHERE zx_app_video_red_packet_info.red_packet_video_info_id = #{redPacketInfoId} LIMIT 1

SELECT b.red_packet_video_id AS redPacketId, -- 红包ID b.red_packet_video_user_id AS memberAccount, -- 发布红包用户ID b.red_packet_video_money_count AS redPacketMoneyCount, -- 红包金额 b.red_packet_video_count AS redPacketCount,-- 红包个数 b.red_packet_video_info AS redPacketInfo,-- 红包显示信息 b.red_packet_video_url AS redPacketVideoUrl, -- 红包视频链接地址 UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.red_packet_video_end_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.red_packet_video_start_time) AS timeSum, -- 抢红包总耗时 b.red_packet_video_date AS redPacketDate,-- 发布红包时间 a.head_img_url AS headImgUrl,-- 发布红包用户头像ID IFNULL(a.nickname,a.member_account) AS nickName, -- 发布红包用户昵称 a.id AS userId -- 用户账号 FROM zx_app_video_red_packet b LEFT JOIN t_member a ON a.member_account = b.red_packet_video_user_id WHERE b.red_packet_video_id IN ( SELECT red_packet_video_id FROM zx_app_video_red_packet_info WHERE red_packet_video_user_id = #{robUserId}) AND b.red_packet_video_stock = 0

SELECT b.member_account AS memberAccount,-- 用户账号 b.head_img_url AS headImgUrl,-- 头像图片链接 IFNULL( b.nickname, b.member_account ) AS nickName,-- 昵称 c.red_packet_video_info AS redPacketInfo,-- 红包广告标语 c.red_packet_video_count AS redPacketCount,-- 红包总个数 c.red_packet_video_stock AS redPacketStock,-- 红包剩余个数 c.red_packet_video_url AS redPacketVideoUrl,-- 红包视频链接地址 UNIX_TIMESTAMP( c.red_packet_video_end_time ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( c.red_packet_video_start_time ) AS timeSum,-- 抢红包总耗时 a.red_packet_video_money AS redPacketMoney,-- 抢红包金额 a.red_packet_video_date AS redPacketDate -- 抢红包时间 FROM zx_app_video_red_packet_info a LEFT JOIN zx_app_video_red_packet c ON c.red_packet_video_id = a.red_packet_video_id LEFT JOIN t_member b ON b.member_account = a.red_packet_video_user_id WHERE a.red_packet_video_user_id = #{robUserId} AND a.red_packet_video_id = #{redPacketVideoId} LIMIT 1

SELECT b.id AS userId,-- 用户ID b.head_img_url AS headImgUrl,-- 头像图片链接 IFNULL( b.nickname, b.member_account ) AS nickName,-- 昵称 b.member_account AS memberAccount,-- 用户账号 a.red_packet_video_money AS redPacketMoney,-- 非当前用户抢钱金额 a.red_packet_video_luck_star AS redPacketLuckStar,-- 非当前用户是否是手气最佳 a.red_packet_video_date AS redPacketDate -- 抢红包时间 FROM zx_app_video_red_packet_info a LEFT JOIN t_member b ON b.member_account = a.red_packet_video_user_id WHERE a.red_packet_video_id = #{redPacketVideoId} AND a.red_packet_video_user_id IS NOT NULL
select COUNT(1) from zx_app_video_red_packet_info WHERE red_packet_video_id = #{redPacketVideoId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND red_packet_video_user_id = #{memberAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select v.red_packet_video_stock AS "redPacketStock", v.red_packet_video_count AS redPacketCount, IFNULL(s.red_packet_user_id,"0") AS "isWrong" from zx_app_video_red_packet v LEFT JOIN zx_app_video_red_packet_scrape s on v.red_packet_video_id = s.red_packet_id and #{memberAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = s.red_packet_user_id where v.red_packet_video_id = #{redPacketVideoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select v.red_packet_video_id AS "redPacketId", v.red_packet_video_count AS "redPacketCount", v.red_packet_video_stock AS "redPacketStock", IFNULL(p.red_packet_video_user_id,"0") AS "isRobRedPacket", IFNULL(s.red_packet_user_id,"0") AS "isWrong" from zx_app_video_red_packet v LEFT JOIN zx_app_video_red_packet_scrape s on v.red_packet_video_id = s.red_packet_id and #{memberAccount} = s.red_packet_user_id LEFT JOIN zx_app_video_red_packet_info p on v.red_packet_video_id = p.red_packet_video_id and p.red_packet_video_user_id = #{memberAccount} where v.red_packet_video_id in #{redPacketIds}
SELECT count(1) FROM ${tableName} WHERE red_packet_id = #{redPacketId} AND red_packet_user_id = #{userId}
